atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's `base`, `components`, `utilities`, and `screens` styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @variants
atDirectives.description: Use the @variants directive to insert Tailwind's responsive and state-based variant styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @responsive
atDirectives.description: Use the @responsive directive to insert Tailwind's responsive variant styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @screen
atDirectives.description: Use the @screen directive to insert Tailwind's screen-based variant styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use the @apply directive to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @config
atDirectives.description: Use the @config directive to insert Tailwind's default configuration values into your CSS as CSS variables.
